title: How to Start to Gut (Swallow) Smokeless Tobacco Juices

steps.title: Get your dip ready.
steps.content: Get your dip ready. Put an average size dip into the front center of your lip.

steps.title: Spit out the first juices.
steps.content: Spit out the first juices. Wait until the juices build up in your mouth with your saliva. Spit out the first couple of build ups. The first three or four should do.

steps.title: Let the juices build up again.
steps.content: Let the juices build up again. Grab a bottle of water or a soft drink of your choice and take a sip, swallowing the built up juices with the drink. When taking the sip of water/soda, roll you lip over the dip to keep it in place.

steps.title: Keep swallowing with your drink.
steps.content: Keep swallowing with your drink. Let the juices build up, then wash them down with a sip of your drink until you are done with the dip. Then take it out.

steps.title: Practice swallowing tobacco juices with a drink.
steps.content: Practice swallowing tobacco juices with a drink. Repeat this process for a couple of days, until you get used to the tobacco juices mixed with the drink. Remember to spit out the first couple of juice build ups, as they'll be stronger than the rest.

steps.title: Get your dip ready.
steps.content: Get your dip ready. Put an average size dip into the front center of your lip.

steps.title: Swallow the first couple of juice build ups.
steps.content: Swallow the first couple of juice build ups. Once the juices have built up, grab a bottle of water or a soft drink of your choice and take a sip to wash down the build up juices with the drink. Remember, now you don't need to spit the first couple of times. You should be able to gut the juice with your drink right away.

steps.title: Get through some of dip with this process.
steps.content: Get through some of dip with this process. Keep swallowing the juice with sips of your drink for 10 to 15 minutes. The juices are now less strong.

steps.title: Gut without the drink for the weaker juices.
steps.content: Gut without the drink for the weaker juices. Once the juices have built up a little, you can swallow the juices without any drink. Do not wait until the juices have built up substantially. Just swallow once they have built up a little bit. Keep doing this until you've finished the dip. Then take it out.

steps.title: Practice gutting the dip without a drink.
steps.content: Practice gutting the dip without a drink. Repeat this process for a couple of days, until you get used to swallowing the weaker tobacco juices. Remember to gut with sips of your drink for the first 10 to 15 minutes before gutting the juices alone.

steps.title: Get your dip ready.
steps.content: Get your dip ready. Put an average size dip in your mouth. It's easy in the front of your mouth, but you can also put it to one side or the other.

steps.title: Gut the juices.
steps.content: Gut the juices. Once the juices have built up a bit, swallow (or gut) the juices. Remember to gut before the juices build up substantially.

steps.title: Finish the dip.
steps.content: Finish the dip. Keep gutting the juices until you are done with the dip. Then take it out. If you start to feel sick or nauseated at any point, stop gutting and try again later.

steps.title: Gut more juice once you're ready.
steps.content: Gut more juice once you're ready. Once you have built up your tolerance, you can let more juices build up before you gut them.
